description: Some governments have introduced measures to increase train travel, but is it enough?
title: How to travel by train - and ditch the plane
title_page: How to travel by train - and ditch the plane - BBC News
maintext: If she had made the return journey from the UK to New York by air, she would have emitted 11% of the average annual emissions for someone in the UK, or the total caused by someone living in Ghana for a year.
